constituent: cap, towel, risk, sun, day, eye
heisigStory: Because of the risk involved (of getting the sun in one's eyes),one puts together a makeshift cap out of a dirty old towel.
koohiiStory1: If you wear a towel as a cap, you are at risk of being seized and searched in U.S. airports.
koohiiStory2: Originally the first cap was a turban which was a towel wrapped around the head to keep the sun out of the eyes.
myStory: mũ lưỡi chai. mũ. khăn che nắng cho mắt
